mapinfo.detailsText:
<color=255,255,255> 地图:每人一小块地 v0.4 
 Map:Everyone Own Small Land v0.4 
作者(Author): Evianaive 
 正常开局玩家会获得两个可被帝国战争马车占领的资源站，一名未知矿工与军医。玩家可以从面包店中购买食物车，它会自动转换为帝国战争马车。所以请保护好你的面包店。如果没有除资源站以外的建筑，玩家会失败
 v0.4增加了升级时代的功能!准备足够的资源后修复围墙即可升时代
 最好启用自由交战，就像在Ra2的每人一小块地中那样。
 如果从游牧时代开局，则为正常游戏。但不推荐。
 Normally player get two SupplyCache that can be captured by imperial wagon, a unknown miner and a surgon. Player can by food wagon in their baker. The food wagon will be convert to imperial wagon. If you don't building except SupplyCache, you will lose
 Age up is avaliable now! You can prepare resources and fix the fort conner in you home to update.
 You should enable free for all, just like what you did in Ra2.
 It will be a normal game If you start from nomad age. But it is not recommend.
mapinfo.displayName: 每人一小块地(Everyone Own Small Land) v0.4
mapinfo.loadDetailsText:

 正常开局玩家会获得两个可被帝国战争马车占领的资源站，一名未知矿工与军医。玩家可以从面包店中购买食物车，它会自动转换为帝国战争马车。所以请保护好你的面包店。如果没有除资源站以外的建筑，玩家会失败
 v0.4增加了升级时代的功能!准备足够的资源后修复围墙即可升时代
 最好启用自由交战，就像在Ra2的每人一小块地中那样。
 如果从游牧时代开局，则为正常游戏。但不推荐。
 Normally player get two SupplyCache that can be captured by imperial wagon, a unknown miner and a surgon. Player can by food wagon in their baker. The food wagon will be convert to imperial wagon. If you don't building except SupplyCache, you will lose
 Age up is avaliable now! You can prepare resources and fix the fort conner in you home to update.
 You should enable free for all, just like what you did in Ra2.
 It will be a normal game If you start from nomad age. But it is not recommend.
